English:
Huh? What's wrong?
Why the sudden investigation of an EDEN spot?
Chinese:
哦？怎麼了？
突然調查起「EDEN點」來了？
Korean:
오? …왜 그래?
갑자기「EDEN 스폿」같은 걸 조사하고
German:
Wie? Was ist? Warum interessiert dich plötzlich
eine EDEN-Station?

English:
What? You detected a special network?
Apart from the connections to EDEN?
Chinese:
嗯？你感應到通往EDEN以外的……
特殊網路？
Korean:
…응? EDEN에 접속하는 것과는 다른…
특수한 네트워크를 감지… 했다고?
German:
Wie? Du hast ein spezielles Netzwerk ausgemacht?
Neben der Verbindung zu EDEN?

English: Hey, hold up, what are you talking ab--
Chinese: 喂喂，你怎麼突然說出這種話？
German: Moment mal, was redest du d–

English:
Gone, without a trace!
Whoa, whoa, whoa! What in the heck is going on?!
Chinese:
消……消失了？
喂喂喂！這到底是怎麼回事？
Korean:
…사, 사라졌어…?
야야야야! 어떻게 된 거야, 진짜로!
German:
Spurlos verschwunden!
Urgh! Was zum Teufel ist hier los?!
